alert.note: Alert for Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:44AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN PICKAWAY AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 544 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near New Holland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Kingston, Williamsport, Bainbridge, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, North Folk Village, Frankfort, Londonderry, Laurelville, Clarksburg, Adelphi, Tarlton, South Salem, Mooresville, Austin, Knockemstiff, Massieville, Bourneville and Andersonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EDT for central and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
